mapper.insert: INSERT INTO operation_log ( username, role, operation, request_path, success, cost_ms, create_time ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{role}, #{operation}, #{requestPath}, #{success}, #{costMs}, NOW() )
mapper.select:
SELECT id, username, role, operation, request_path, success, cost_ms, create_time FROM operation_log
AND username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
AND operation LIKE CONCAT('%', #{operation}, '%')
AND success = #{success}
ORDER BY create_time DESC
